title: ChatGPT: What "Error in Moderation" Means & How to Fix It

steps.title: The "Error in Moderation" error doesn't have a clear meaning.
steps.content: The "Error in Moderation" error doesn't have a clear meaning. OpenAI hasn't posted any information about what "Error in Moderation" means specifically, but users tend to get the error when ChatGPT is experiencing an outage or has a lot of traffic. [1] X Research source This is one of a few errors you might get when ChatGPT is having issues. Some of the others include "Error in input stream," "Message in conversation not found," or "network error."

steps.title: Check ChatGPT's status.
steps.content: Check ChatGPT's status. Go to the OpenAI status page and check ChatGPT's status. If it says something other than "Operational" next to ChatGPT, the service is likely having issues. If this is the case, you'll need to wait for OpenAI to fix the issues.

steps.title: Rephrase your message.
steps.content: Rephrase your message. Check the last message that you sent. If the request you sent was difficult for ChatGPT to understand, phrased in an unclear way, or contained profanity, adult content, or discriminatory content, ChatGPT may be throwing the error because of OpenAI's content and age restrictions.

steps.title: Start a new chat.
steps.content: Start a new chat. Sometimes, the "Error in Moderation" error could be a simple glitch that is fixed by starting a new chat. Open a new chat window with ChatGPT and try sending your message again.

steps.title: Log out and back in.
steps.content: Log out and back in. If starting a new chat doesn't fix the issue, try logging out and back in. If there's any random glitches with your ChatGPT session, relogging in should fix those issues.

steps.title: Subscribe to ChatGPT Plus.
steps.content: Subscribe to ChatGPT Plus. According to technology expert Tyrone Showers, ChatGPT Plus users get priority during peak times when the OpenAI servers are busier. If the "Error in Moderation" error is due to busy servers, ChatGPT Plus could help. ChatGPT plus is $20 per month. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Wait for the servers to be less busy.
steps.content: Wait for the servers to be less busy. If nothing else fixes the issue, it's likely that ChatGPT's servers are too busy and they can't process your request. Unfortunately, the only way to fix this is to wait for the servers to calm down. If you suspect ChatGPT is at capacity and you want to see how you can get around it, check out this wikiHow article .
